activities:
ZedX creates web based products for user input and output of land data. The user personal information is not used in this process but the boundary lines of his or her property.  

We use the data to identify the participant when they log into our product.  Use the data to send an email for a lost password, billing, identify a boundary to a customer or organization, Identify the account with a caller in customer support, Mainly the information is to setup an identification to separate one user from another, and additionally see our privacy policy
eucountries: France, Germany, Italy, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Software - (CSF)Agricultural Services - (AGS)General Science & Technology - (GST)Information Services - (INF)
personaldata: Fill name, Company, Job Title, Address, Phone, Fax, Email, Boundaries for land. No manually processed data.
